AboutMe:
Programmer since 1967. Worked for MS Canada PSS 1994 - 1995. Self employed 25 years. Program mainframe, mini, PC. APL, assembler, BASIC, C, C++, C#, COBOL, FORTRAN, J, Java, Pascal, Perl, PL/I, RPG II/III, VB, VBA, et cetera. Taught Business Systems Analysis and programming courses at community college level. Clients include GM, IBM. Male. Age 66. Married. Two adult progeny. Hobbies include computer and natural languages, chess, mathematics, reading. Ethical Vegan.

Twitter: @gerrylowry1947 http://twitter.com/gerrylowry1947
